channel.title: Lunar Paradise - The road to the best RSPS!
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to your journey into the best RSPS around. We have so many features, and we are in the need for staff, so join today and see what you're missing out on! :)
- Rock steady, powerful VPS to keep the server up 24x7.
- Amazing Combat system with skills such as Dungeoneering, Summoning and PK'ing to fit everybody's needs!
- Flawless gambling by a few hand-picked dicers so no one is ever scammed! This is your chance to get rich today!
-Unique bosses such as Nomad, Sea Queen Troll so you are always rewarded for your efforts from impressive drops!
-Custom Dungeoneering with unimaginable rewards such as the praised Primal Armor only achievable by dungeoneering.
And so many more features here at Lunar Paradise. With all this in mind, there should be no reason why you shouldn't join in on our journey today!
Webclient: http://www.lunarparadises.wix.com/lunar Website: http://www.lunarparadise.weebly.com Forums: http://www.lunarparadise.weebly.com/forums.html Download: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/4cwu76fg39xrbnp/Lunar%20Paradise.jar
Join in on our journey today!
